page.title: 06HOUSING IN TODDINGTON 1
page.content: {Toddington}is a pleasant village in easy reach of London. In general the housing has been well maintained and and the rural atmosphere has been preserved. The total number of houses in Toddington is 1214. This figure can be divided into these catagories:_ {-------------------------------------- {DETACHED 339*BUNGALOWS 90 *FLATS 61 {SEMI/DET 486*TERRACED 238* {-------------------------------------- The oldest housing can be found around the village green and around the main roads leading from it. There are examples of houses from most periods but only two estates have been built recently:{Alma Farm,}which is a large development of 82 detached houses in the west of the village and a smaller development of 16 houses called "The Cleavers". All other new houses have been in_filled.
